title: Is Flirting Worth Breaking Up
itunes:title: Is Flirting Worth Breaking Up
description:
Today on the show it was reported that the reason why love and hip- hop star Karlie Redd's ex fiance broke off the engagement because she was caught flirting with "Moneybag yo" so we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners thought it was enough to break up. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a wanted man that said that he will turn himself if he gets a certain amount of likes and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
